title: tuxappcoin
author: tuxappcoin
content: Tux App Network could be defined as an ecosystem of interconnected applications implemented on blockchain technology and developed with open source tools.  Tuxappcoin (one coin to rule our entire ecosystem)Nombre: TuxappcoinSímbolo: TUXAMainnet: Scolcoin Wei ChainDecimales: 18Suministro Total: 10000000000Contrato: 0x6406a6Ed412d03134e4253831A99fDcB26dd3842Ver en el explorador https://explorer.scolcoin.com/token/0x6406a6Ed412d03134e4253831A99fDcB26dd3842/token-transfers Ver en el DEX https://dex.scolcoin.com/info/pool/0x47c21655c5329de94091c4aaad07d481119feddbour first app : TUXA NETWORK (crypto social network)*Publications of States (link, videos,images)*Creation of groups+forums*Creations of events*Donations *Sale of content created by members *LikePágina web: tuxapp.online/tuxanetworkNote: Spanish speaking project

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: A token launched on an unknown chain with less than 500 wallets
